author: xtqqczze
body:
While working on #14242, I found a particular complex `if` statement, so I've refactored it to be more readable.

I've split the refactoring into logical steps to to ease review.

Contributes to #14242.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:

title: Refactor complex if statement
